top_5_risks.description: Must provide exactly 5 risks prioritized by materiality, not document order. Each risk should include a clear title, concise summary, and actionable analyst implication.

prioritization_rationale.description: Must explain why these 5 risks were selected over others and the logic behind the ranking. Should demonstrate understanding of materiality assessment.

methodology_notes.description: Must describe the analytical approach used to identify and prioritize risks from the S-1 Risk Factors section.
